explains: adj. 阳光照射的；被日光照射了的

sentences.en: Claire looked longingly at the sunlit gardens outside the window.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔充满渴望地看着窗外洒满阳光的花园。

sentences.en: Her house has two big sunlit rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows.
sentences.cn: 她的房子有两间朝阳面的带落地窗的大屋子。

sentences.en: He sat and gazed at the sunlit water and his eyes began to see things growing at its edge.
sentences.cn: 他坐在那里，凝视着阳光照耀的水面，他看到了岸边生长的东西。
